text: William Bownd (fl. 1658) was a Welsh Arminian Baptist minister. He lived in Montgomeryshire but worshipped with Arminian Baptists in Radnorshire. It is unknown whether he received a stipend for his ministry after 1658. Together with John Price of Maes-y-Gelli, Nantmel parish, Radnorshire, he published the book, The Sun Outshining the Moon (London, 1658). The date of his death is unknown. == References == ==External links== Category:Arminian ministers Category:Arminian writers Category:Baptist ministers Category:Welsh religious leaders Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown
title: William Bownd
